definition: The procedure initialization is used to initialize variables used by the procedure loop.

paragraphs.text: This is an example of a procedure loop code snippet, in particular, the code that initializes the array used in the calculation of the Popular SMAs product of the Simple Moving Average (SMA) indicator.

To add a procedure initialization, select Add Procedure Initialization on the corresponding procedure node menu. A procedure initialization node is created along with the corresponding JavaScript node.
